author: BBC News
title: Tonga volcano: Internet restored five weeks after eruption
description: The Pacific island nation was cut off from the world for weeks after an undersea volcano erupted.
content:
Image source, AUSTRALIA DEFENCE FORCE
Image caption, The underwater internet cable has finally been restored
